data.name: Seed of Amaranth Demo
data.detailed_description:
What does it take to be a hero, and at what cost?

In the irradiated kingdom of Amantia, six characters struggle with this question, bringing them into conflict and unexpected friendships with each other.
A dreamer, burning with passion.
A hero, living life to its fullest.
A protector, treasuring his one true love.
A victim, an unfortunate soul tortured by fate.
How will these roles define them? How will their choices change them?

Follow our narrators as they go through their own stories, getting to understand both why they make the decisions they do and how their actions can have consequences for others. In this story, there are no villains, no good versus evil. There is only the consequence of choice.

In this demo, you can play through the first Act of Seed of Amaranth. Get to know the characters, and see the events that position them for the rest of the story.

Welcome to Seed of Amaranth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 847 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 847 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
